# Eldritch Delver (Trait)
## Overview
**Eldritch Delver:** You have an unquenchable thirst for knowledge about the world and desire to obtain it firsthand. You gain a +1 trait bonus on all [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (dungeoneering) and [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (history) checks, and you may treat your caster level as 1 level higher for all conjuration spells of the teleportation subschool.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 57
